Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory79.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Frankly, I can't tell how that trial is related to wisdom at all.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But it was pretty fun as an activity. Liv and I were guessing along as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Were all the gesturings you guys were doing just you trying to solve the puzzles?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right. I got distracted for a second, and Liv won in the end.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Should we give Liv a reward, then?', 3: '10', 4: 'Do you want a rematch next time, Lucia?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh, I... I don't need any rewards... Lee and Commandant winning is the best reward I can hope for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'll do my best if there is a rematch.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Anyway, we've got two keys with us now. It also proves the importance of finding out whose portrait it is.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: "Oh, ain't your trials going smoothly, Gray Raven from Babylonia!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why are you here?', 3: '14', 4: "What's up?", 5: '15'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Not that odd for me to hang around the place. I'm part of the crew, after all! But you're right that I'm here for another reason.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Something's up! But you ain't the one I'm looking for.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After greeting you all, the foreman walks over to the South General, who is disappointed with the riddle having been solved, and smacks him on the back of the head.'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'Ouch! What was that, Foreman?!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Do you still have to ask? What are you doing leaving your post and coming all the way here? Look at that mess of a queue outside with all those mechanoids!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'Ugh!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Just pick yourself up and head back, or the event's screwed!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'South General', 3: 'U-understood!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think I know why he is the foreman.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: 'I have to thank you as well, Babylonians.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Because y'all are great contestants, that's why! The Fist of the Taoist has never been as competitive as this year, thanks to you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Now that you've mentioned it, there were indeed mechanoids cheering for us, just like an audience.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'The competition is an event, after all.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But why are you organizing these activities during the Ghost Festival? The festival in the records is supposed to be...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Of course we know what the Ghost Festival is supposed to be. We're just... trying to find an excuse to do something together, is what it is.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Can't you do that in your daily lives?", 3: '30', 4: 'Just to fool around?', 5: '31'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'The lives of us mechanoids are way more boring than you think.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "That's a good way to put it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Which is to say... sometimes we would want to remember the good ol' days too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "These old days you're talking about...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Hmm, weird to talk about this sort of thing in front of guests, ain't it? Trek along now to find the West General. I should return to my patrol!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "From what Foreman said, this event shouldn't be dangerous to begin with. Let's keep going, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's go.", 3: '37', 4: "Lucia's next, right?", 5: '38'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Nods) Let's head toward the Western trial.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Nods) We don't have anyone else, anyway. Let's go get our third victory!", 4: '2'}
